sentences.en: a fine collection of Greek statuary
sentences.cn: 一批精美的希腊雕塑藏品

sentences.en: In several states it is not even a statuary requirement.
sentences.cn: 在有的州里登记并不是雷打不动的要求.

sentences.en: Mary and Jesus statuary and old castle.
sentences.cn: 圣母玛利亚,耶稣塑像和古堡.

sentences.en: Rodin's Old Streetwalker is a rare work in statuary history.
sentences.cn: 罗丹的《老娼妓》是雕塑史上一件不可多得的杰作.

sentences.en: Some farmers are harvesting behind the destroyed statuary of Song Mausoleum.
sentences.cn: 在残损的宋陵雕像后收获秋粮的农民.

sentences.en: Statuary space is an important field for both traditional sculpture and modern sculpture.
sentences.cn: 雕塑的空间,是传统雕塑和现代雕塑研究的重要领域.

sentences.en: Statuary space may be divided into two parts, physical space and psychological space.
sentences.cn: 雕塑的空间大致可分为两类:物理空间和心理空间.

sentences.en: The giant statuary that bears the inscription is He Zun which is the Treasure of China.
sentences.cn: 承载铭文的巨型雕塑是我们的镇国之宝——何尊.

sentences.en: The home - made statuary gave an artistic air to the room.
sentences.cn: 这些 自制 的雕像给房间增添了艺术气息.

sentences.en: The ring of snake consuming its own tail first appeared as art adorning Egyptian statuary.
sentences.cn: 这个咬着自己尾巴的蛇所形成的环,最初作为艺术装饰出现在埃及雕塑中.

sentences.en: The statuary of Yan Xiu is on the top of the column ( bronze ).
sentences.cn: 最上端安放严修先生的肖像 ( 青铜 ).

sentences.en: Therefore, statuary had turn into a three - dimensional political picture poster.
sentences.cn: 由此, 雕塑成为了一种 立体 的政治“宣传画”.

words.tran_cn: 雕像般的；轮廓清晰的；均衡的

trans.tran_cn: （总称）雕塑，塑像，铸像，制造雕塑
